issue.title: [C++] Add "Type" to names of arrow::Integer, arrow::FloatingPoint classes for consistency
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5334](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5334). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These intermediate classes used for template metaprogramming (in particular, `std::is_base_of`) have inconsistent names with the rest of data types. For clarity, I think we should add "Type" to these class names and others like them

Please do after ARROW-3144

comments.body:
